review_data.title: Old fashion für nostalgiker

review_data.title: Top Gun
review_data.content: Jeder Abend ist TOP. Jeder Drink schlägt ein wie GUNs n Roses. TOM collins, ein sehr geiler Drink um zu starten. Die CRUISE geht jedes mal bis tief in die Nacht. PLAYING good music all night. WITH a lot of different drinks they amase THE...More

review_data.title: Gemütlicher Weekend Ausklang
review_data.content: Wa echt angenehm, da es nicht überführt war, momentan eher arg besucht. War dennoch klar Sonntag Abend ;)

review_data.title: Sehr gemütlich
review_data.content: Freundliche Bedienung, stilvoll, ein Treffpunkt, wie ich ihn anderwo in Zürich noch nicht gefunden habe.

review_data.title: Nice bar
review_data.content: A nice nice bar next to the Zürich main station. Old style, not fancy but the perfect place for a drink with friends or to meet some new friends.

review_data.title: Coole Bar

review_data.title: Great Small Bar in Old Town
review_data.content: We found this bar while walking in Old Town on Zahringerstrasse. It was time for a beer so we dropped in to try it. Even though it was a bit crowded, the bartender greeted us with a smile asked us where we live and chatted...More

review_data.title: Gute Musik, einheimische Gäste, eine der letzten Nicht-Yuppie-Bastionen

review_data.title: Legendary. Classic. And More...
review_data.content: The Safari Bar has been one of Zürich's most famous haunts for seemingly forever. Along with a handful of other aging beauties this dive bar has everything both new hipsters and old hippies prize: great vibe, cool bartenders, outlandish exotica, and various components of the...More

review_data.title: Zurück in die Zukunft
review_data.content: Coole oldstyle Bar. Man fühlt sich in seine jugendlichen Sturm- und Drangjahre zurück versetzt. Freundliches Personal. Gute Drinks. Spezielle Einrichtung....More

review_data.title: Good to have a drink in the end of the day
review_data.content: The Safari is located in one of the most popular places in Zurich. The streets around the bar is full of night live. You can have a good beer and food over there. The price is the same of the others in the region.

review_data.title: Super Comfortable Bar
review_data.content: Old style, local beers, everything you could wish for. Definetly recommend coming here. Might be crowded at peak times!

review_data.title: different beers

review_data.title: Bom
review_data.content: O restaurante e bar Safari Bar é frequentado por gente jovem e descolado e serve boas cervejas e acompanhamentos.

review_data.title: Muito bom
review_data.content: O Safari Bar é um bar com um cardápio muito bom e variado, com ótimo atendimento e ambiente agradável.

review_data.title: Least favourite bar, size of a small cafe, not conducive to night-life

review_data.title: Always good music, friendly service, and a rockin atmosphere
review_data.content: Good times, open late, friendly service and staff, diverse crowd, and the staff have great taste in rock music. Fine place to get together with friends any day of the week.

review_data.title: Nice place for a beer or a cocktail
review_data.content: This bar in the center of Zurich is welcoming for youngs and adults, and also have relatively low prices (for Swiss standards)

review_data.title: Good bier and people
review_data.content: We went there for a bier before dinner in Niederdorf. Staff is very kind and helpful. Very good bier, expecially the christmas one, not expensive at all. Location is so warm and relaxing, with warm light and wooden tables. Free wifi available. Very good place...More

review_data.title: Very friendly staff and a nice bar
